item.title: Dordaneh add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "No medicine cures what happiness cannot." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: Dordaneh add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "There [is] no innocence more dangerous than the innocence of age." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: Dordaneh add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Dordaneh add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Life is too short, or too long, for me to allow myself the luxury of living it so badly." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Dordaneh add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Dordaneh add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Dordaneh add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Dordaneh add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Where there is love there is life." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Dordaneh add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Freedom is not worth having if it does not include the freedom to make mistakes." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Dordaneh add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Dordaneh add a quote by Diane Ackerman
item.description: "I don't want to get to the end of my life and find that I have just lived the length of it. I want to have lived the width of it as well." -- Diane Ackerman

item.title: Dordaneh add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Dordaneh add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Dordaneh add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Dordaneh add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Dordaneh add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Dordaneh add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Life is an opportunity, benefit from it. Life is beauty, admire it. Life is a dream, realize it. Life is a challenge, meet it. Life is a duty, complete it. Life is a game, play it. Life is a promise, fulfill it. Life is sorrow, overcome it. Life is a song, sing it. Life is a struggle, accept it. Life is a tragedy, confront it. Life is an adventure, dare it. Life is luck, make it. Life is too precious, do not destroy it. Life is life, fight for it." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Dordaneh add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Dordaneh add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Dordaneh add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Dordaneh add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Dordaneh add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Dordaneh add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Dordaneh add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Dordaneh add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "Hope is the thing with feathers That perches in the soul And sings the tune without the words And never stops at all." -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Dordaneh add a quote by Barack Obama
item.description: "Yes We Can!" -- Barack Obama

item.title: Dordaneh add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Dordaneh add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "You will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of. You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life." -- Albert Camus
